publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7025 Joe FitzPatrick: Discovery Award Scheme—That the Parliament congratulates what it considers the continued success of the Discovery Award Scheme in allowing people over 50 to discover new talents, strengths and interests, allowing them to find new and interesting people as well as the satisfaction of helping others; notes the expansion of the scheme from Dundee in 1987 to dozens of nations around the world, and wishes the scheme and everyone involved all the very best wishes for their future endeavours.
S3M-7025 Discovery Award Scheme (lodged on 20 September 2010) Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*, Brian Adam*, Sandra White*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-7025 Discovery Award Scheme (lodged on 20 September 2010) Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-7025 Discovery Award Scheme (lodged on 20 September 2010) Nigel Don*, Gil Paterson*, Maureen Watt*, Marlyn Glen*

S3M-7025 Joe FitzPatrick: Discovery Award Scheme—That the Parliament congratulates what it considers the continued success of the Discovery Award Scheme in allowing people over 50 to discover new talents, strengths and interests, allowing them to find new and interesting people as well as the satisfaction of helping others; notes the expansion of the scheme from Dundee in 1987 to dozens of nations around the world, and wishes the scheme and everyone involved all the very best wishes for their future endeavours. Supported by: Bob Doris, Jamie Hepburn, Brian Adam, Sandra White, Elaine Smith, Robin Harper, Bill Kidd, Kenneth Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Nigel Don, Gil Paterson, Maureen Watt, Marlyn Glen
